synopsis.text: One by one, police officers are falling prey to a mysterious killer, creating a wave of fear within the law enforcement community. Amid this chaos, officer Satou Keiji becomes the latest target, and the horrifying incident unfolds before Ran's eyes. The trauma of witnessing the crime leaves Ran with no recollection of her past, making her an easy target for the murderer who seeks to eliminate the only eyewitness. As the police struggle to solve the case internally, young detective Conan steps in to safeguard Ran and unravel the identity of the killer, all while keeping his own identity under wraps. With the stakes higher than ever, Conan must act swiftly to prevent the killer from striking again and ensure Ran's safety.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
